BlackBox.name: Clash.Explicit.Signal.unsafeSynchronizer
BlackBox.type:
unsafeSynchronizer
  :: ( KnownDomain tag1 conf1    -- ARG[0]
     , KnownDomain tag2 conf2 )  -- ARG[1]
  => Clock dom1                  -- ARG[2]
  -> Clock dom2                  -- ARG[3]
  -> Signal tag1 a               -- ARG[4]
  -> Signal tag2 a
